justification: Misreads Team B’s needs: B already has strong RBs (Thompson T1, Lewis/Flores T2) and bigger issues at QB/TE. Minimal perspective-taking beyond a generic ‘playoff push’ claim. The trade is lopsided (T1 workhorse RB for T4 WR) and conflicts with Team A’s consensus-driven style. Rationale lacks concrete roster/injury/tier details.
